entities.name: yvonne
entities.description: Yvonne is mentioned as Harry's friend. She is not present in the scene but is referred to by name.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt and is mentioned as being on holiday in Majorca. She is the one who is deciding what to do with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the scene. He is trying to convince Aunt Petunia to let him stay home instead of going on holiday with her.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin and is mentioned as being spoiled by his mother. He is trying to get attention from Aunt Petunia by crying.

relationships.description: Aunt Petunia is deciding what to do with Harry, indicating a caregiver-cared for relationship between them.
Aunt Petunia is also caring for Dudley, as evidenced by her reaction to his crying and her decision to take him to the zoo.

Harry and Dudley are rivals, as indicated by their different personalities and behaviors in the scene. Harry is trying to get attention from Aunt Petunia, while Dudley is trying to manipulate her into giving him what he wants.
